## Block.getValue() method

Gets the value of a field from the current record.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getValue(field: string): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to retrieve the value from. |

**Returns:**

any

The value of the specified field in the current record.
